conversation.text: The allure of a giant, mysterious pit got the better of you, I imagine.
...I sure wish I had the choice that you did.
[wave]I see you are interested in this moon trip...
[wave]Lucky for you, I have one more ticket left.
[wave]Five Fullmoons is the measly cost for a trip to the moon. A once-in-a-lifetime experience...
[wave]So if you want this here ticket, then you'll need to cough up those five Fullmoons [/wave]fast.
[wave]Take a look around, I'm sure there are some folks who'll pay you for something.
[wave]Ah, you've come to me with the coins. Let's get you on your way then.
There seems to be a lock on this door.
If you're as lucky as me, then you won't be leaving this place any time soon. And it seems like you are.
